body.name: Adhesive Doorbell Door Mount Compatible with Video Doorbell 1/2/3/4 Adjustable Angle Doorbell Mounting Bracket cover Holder Not Block Doorbell Sensor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 13 hrs 20 mins
features: Compatible Doorbells:compatible with the Video Doorbell 2 / 3 / 3 Plus / 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release), Please check the left picture No.2 for Compatible model No. (Doorbell is Not Included ) 2 Ways Installation: There is Strong grade VHB tape at the back of cover , just tear it off and stick it on the door (Note: After the adhesive tape, wait for at least 24 hours before using.) or install it on the wall with included screws

Full coverage protection& Weatherproof Design : Real 360 degree protection and protects your doorbell from scratching and rain,dust ,it doesn't block the video doorbell sensor.There is a hidden security screw at the bottom and it is not easty to be stolen
Adjustable Angle Scale: The video doorbell mount has angle scale. allows adjusting the angle to left or right from 0 to 50 degree It give you a better view angle

2 Ways Installation: There is Strong grade VHB tape at the back of cover , just tear it off and stick it on the door (Note: After the adhesive tape, wait for at least 24 hours before using.) or install it on the wall with included screws

Ideal for Smooth door Surface: The mount is safest and most effective for applying on a flat, smooth door surface like laminates Tile Glass Marble , Please install it with the included screws on the brick, shingles, and rough wall surfaces

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, easy to adjust left and right.
reviews.reviewText: We really like this holder for the ring doorbell. It worked awesome for us, the appearance looks nice. The durability, easy to adjust, very happy with it. Would definitely recommend this item. The price was hard to beat. I believe period

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great! But not for Ring
reviews.reviewText: Great quality product with a lot of adjustability and secure mounting. Comes with everything you need. HOWEVER. Did NOT work with my Ring wired doorbell. Unfortunately, I had modified the mount to work where I wanted to mount it otherwise I would have returned it. There is some foam in the package to help fit other cameras, but the space up and down was just too much to mount my doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Renter Friendly - Cheap and Effective
reviews.reviewText: We got this to use for a rental property. We needed a damage free solution to hang our Ring doorbell and this fit the bill. Overall, pretty pleased! Unfortunate that you have to take it apart to adjust the angle, but it's not the end of the world.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: I love how I can change the angles and it’s small and convenient for small doorbell space.
